  • Packages that use org.apache.taverna.activities.externaltool.desc 
    Package Description
    org.apache.taverna.activities.externaltool
    Contains the activity classes required to interact with use cases.

  • Classes in org.apache.taverna.activities.externaltool.desc used by org.apache.taverna.activities.externaltool.desc 
    Class and Description
    RuntimeEnvironment
    Representation of information about a single runtime environment.
    RuntimeEnvironmentConstraint
    When use cases present a runtime environment, then they don't want to express that these would provide such, but that these request such, i.e.
    ScriptInput
    Integrates inputs to the grid that come from the use case descriptions with those that are fed through the workflow.
    ScriptInputStatic
    This subclass of script input is used to manage static content which is embedded into the use case description.
    ScriptInputUser
    Internal description of output
    ScriptOutput
    Internal description of input
    ToolDescription
    Class representation of XML-description of UseCases

    ToolDescription.OutputMap
